name: Janken: A Rock Paper Scissors RPG
name_original: Janken: A Rock Paper Scissors RPG
description:
after waking up to see your entire home island being purged by some very strange invaders, you must set out to stop this evil using the deadliest art known to man: rock-paper-scissors

to defeat someone via rock-paper-scissors, you must win 3 rounds against them, and they will cease to live.

most of these strange invaders aren't inherently hostile, however, so it's usually up to you whether to initiate combat or not. play as you desire!

game length: (around) 20 minutes, given you don't suck at rock-paper-scissors

full OST: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6UHX-9Bo7ks
